DOC.criteria: Inclusion Requirements Women age 40 85 Recommended biopsy BIRADS assessment category 4 ( suspicious abnormality ) 5 ( highly suggestive malignancy ) Able MLO CC view take Good general health Able willing provide write Informed Consent Exclusion Requirements Under age 40 Pregnant suspicious pregnant Breast implant Breasts large adequately position 24 x 30 cassette Personal history breast cancer treat lumpectomy Unable unwilling provide write Informed Consent form
